Class VOTableUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.vo.VOTableUtils

  • public class VOTableUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to access data in a VO Table.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)

    • Method Detail

      • getFieldNameInVOTable

        public static java.lang.String getFieldNameInVOTable(cds.savot.model.SavotVOTable sv,
                                     java.lang.String catalogName,
                                     int index,
                                     int tableIndex)
                                              throws JPARSECException
        Returns the name of a field in certain VO table.
        Parameters:
        sv - VO table.
        catalogName - Name of the catalog to analize.
        index - Index number for the field, from 0 to the number of fields minus 1.
        tableIndex - Index for the table, 0 unless the catalog contains more than 1 and the first one is not the one where the field is located.
        Returns:
        Field name. Empty string if catalog is not found.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If index is out of range.
